txt.en: Throne of the Dread Terror: Fear or Flame

Vadokhar feeds on flame and shadow, drawing vile strength from both. You must defeat him without allowing him to gather the power of more than one type.\n\n<rgb=#FF0000>This deed can only be completed on Tier 2 of the Throne of the Dread Terror raid.</rgb>

Vadokhar feeds on flame and shadow, drawing vile strength from both. You must defeat him without allowing him to gather the power of more than one type.\n\n<rgb=#FF0000>This deed can only be completed on Tier 2 of the Throne of the Dread Terror raid.</rgb>
You have completed Challenge: Fear or Flame
